about.details: Professional with 5 years of experience in back end developing. I am looking to join a team where I can contribute my experience and continue developing my skills.

experiences.name: Web Developer
experiences.missionShort: Develop and mantain desktop and web systems
missionLong: Implemented RESTful APIs to integrate internal and external systems, improving interoperability across platforms
Developed and mantained responsive web applications using technologies such as HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and frameworks such as MVC5.
Worked as part of a team to implement new features on a ERP.
Optimize website performance, reducing load times by 40% using image compression and code minification tecniques.
Designed and integrated SOAP services into enterprise applications, using technologies such as .NET to create secure and scalable web service interfaces.
